fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Visit a player, if they are a Jedi, they lose their Force Abilities, otherwise they are Drained
Drained Enemies lose their Defense stats.
You may only Drain Life 3 times. Is increased to 5 times if both Darth Traya and Darth Sion are in play.
Unique, Gains Sith Chat, Conversion Immune, (has special message "You attempted to convert someone who is a hole in the Force.") May perform factional kill.
